articles.author: Mike Potter
articles.title: Indiana Fever announce 2 players will miss the rest of the season; Clark out vs. Sky - WTHR
articles.description: Both players suffered lower body injuries during the Aug. 7 game against the Phoenix Mercury.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS The Indiana Fever say guards Sydney Colson and Aari McDonald will both miss the rest of the 2025 WNBA season due to injuries suffered in the Aug. 8 game with the Phoenix Mercury.
